Key Match Events: England beat Switzerland in a penalty shootout to reach Euro 2024 semifinals
Bukayo Saka scored the equalizing goal for England in the 80th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Trent Alexander-Arnold expressed his joy and gratitude for the opportunity to score the winning goal in the shootout
Gareth Southgate discussed the team's character, belief, heart, and spirit in the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: England manager Gareth Southgate's own England career was defined by a semifinal shootout miss against Germany when England hosted the 1996 European Championship
Switzerland exits the European Championship on penalties in the quarterfinals for the second time running
Others: England goes on to play Netherlands in Dortmund on Wednesday for a spot in the final
Switzerland coach Murat Yakin expressed his sadness for the players after the loss
